title: cryptoliquor
author: cryptoliquor
content: Bitcoin has brought so much more meaning into my life.Years ago when I thought the system had me and I wasn't making any money I fell upon bitcoin. At first, I was there for just the monetary gain but then I after I realized that bitcoin gives you your time back I discovered ways to hustle harder and stack my time with btc. Long story short I am able to work remotley and live anywhere and be happy with what I have because I know without bitcoin I would never have this life. Thank you satoshi

comments.author: BitDane
comments.body: Bitcoin indeed open up new opportunities for people who are looking for it.  Since the industry of Bitcoin is still too young, there are lots of start-ups that wanted to venture and try the industry in hopes that it will bring them success and huge profit.  With that, those people who are indeed got interested in Bitcoin not only through trading but by doing business or freelance job can find lots of chances to take advantage of this booming trend.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Same here, bitcoin gives me the opportunity to work with people from all around the world, and personally I love to work from home, has been doing it for the past 8 years and I will keep doing it.We need to approach these freedom times because I'm not sure that we will be allowed to do this in the future, govs aren't happy at all watching how people avoid taxes with bitcoin, and they will bring some rules to avoid this. But now sure when that will happen.

comments.author: kawetsriyanto
comments.body: Sorry, but it is not really clear what BTC has done to your life. Does BTC make you rich or what?Please make it more detailed, dude!  However, it was lucky that you decided to have BTC several years ago. If you bought your BTC in 2018, I am sure you have taken profits in 2021.Honestly, I also experienced it, taken profits quite well in 2021 from BTC I bought in 2018. Now, once again I prepared my BTC for 2024-2025, it's good time to collect some BTC. The situation in 2022 is almost the same as 2018, it is the first year of bearish. We have many opportunities to buy BTC at cheap price (buy the dip).Quote from: Koadharber on December 19, 2022, 10:56:00 PMpossibly changed up someones lives and there are lots of people who are really that thankful for this opportunity but of course it would really be still depending or varying on how you do work for it.There should be nice and bad stories about investing in BTC.Only those people invest/trade in proper way who can take advantage from the opportunities.But those who invest/trade carelessly probably end up with bad story, surely no thankful to the opportunity.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: kawetsriyanto on December 19, 2022, 11:16:10 PMSorry, but it is not really clear what BTC has done to your life. Does BTC make you rich or what?Please make it more detailed, dude!  From what I've understood from his post, it's all about being financially free and having the freedom back that he's allocated to other things before. So that's most likely the summary of his post about being thankful for bitcoin. Also, he's got a job that's being paid in bitcoin. Quote from: cryptoliquor on December 19, 2022, 10:31:22 PMI know without bitcoin I would never have this life. Thank you satoshi True story mate. We all won't be feeling like what you're feeling right now if it were not for bitcoin. Using it as a payment for remote tasks, transfers and also as an investment at the same time, we're all grateful that there's satoshi who has invented it.

comments.author: kamvreto
comments.body: the question is, what do you do with bitcoin to make a lot of money so that bitcoin can change your life? are you a trader, a big investor? or are you just a braggart?You must maybe need transaction proof or logical proof that bitcoin changed your life. It's not just stories that are only written in text. anyone can make up stories they like, but the experience in bitcoin is bound to be there and it will be proof that you are doing great things with bitcoin.New accounts with new addresses that don't have bitcoin assets, come with fictitious stories... LOL.

comments.author: romero121
comments.body: That's really good, it have given the freedom than depending on the banking system. As OP have mentioned he's able to work remotely and enjoy his life. Positive thing about bitcoin and the same have opened lots and lots of opportunities. Same time people should not misunderstand it as a way to earn and the same could cause massive loss. There are possible ways, which needs to be learnt.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: If your testimony or statements are true, it is not Bitcoin who did it but you yourself. Bitcoin is just a digital currency whoch has many advantages and it happened that its market value is volatile which made it as well a good and profitable asset.Quote from: BitDane on December 19, 2022, 10:36:37 PMBitcoin indeed open up new opportunities for people who are looking for it.  Since the industry of Bitcoin is still too young, there are lots of start-ups that wanted to venture and try the industry in hopes that it will bring them success and huge profit.  With that, those people who are indeed got interested in Bitcoin not only through trading but by doing business or freelance job can find lots of chances to take advantage of this booming trend.Unfortunately, not all people are succeeding with their ventures in this industry. Some are losing money literally. Interest into this technology won't be enough; hard work and eagerness are all needed in order to make use of the potential cryptocurrencies as a form of investment. Also in line with being a mode of payment, things are still not in good terms. Many countries are still not accepting this digital currency as a mode of payment because of certain issues of it. Thus, I guess it would affect its emergence, in line with your so called "boomin trend".

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Everyone in the cryptocurrency industry has something to be grateful for, it has empowered so many people, including me, even though I initially thought it would be a difficult task for me. Over time, however, I was able to cope thanks to this forum, where I had access to a wealth of information, especially security. Scammers have attempted to trick me, particularly on Telegram, into making investments in businesses or providing support, however, as the saying goes, "Knowledge is power," and most especially hold don't sell.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Yeah, well, we already have another thread praising Bitcoin with nothing concrete, which I guess he's hoping to fish for some merit. Supposedly because it allows him to work remotely, but that's not because of Bitcoin, it's because of the internet. There are many ways to make money online, which the internet allows, and the ways to make money with Bitcoin are a few among a very broad set. I would like to know more specifically the story of the OP to see if I just believe it.
